question: What is the return policy?
answer: You can return items within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Refund processing takes 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. Return shipping is free for most items.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping takes 1-2 business days. Same-day delivery available in select cities. Free shipping on orders over $50.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: To track your order: 1) Go to 'My Orders' section 2) Enter your order number 3) View real-time tracking status. You'll receive SMS/email updates automatically.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and buy-now-pay-later options like Klarna and Afterpay. All payments are processed securely with SSL encryption.

question: How do I exchange an item?
answer: To exchange an item: 1) Start a return request 2) Select 'Exchange' option 3) Choose new size/color 4) Ship original item back 5) New item ships once we receive original. Exchange window is 30 days.

question: What if my payment failed?
answer: If payment fails, check: 1) Card details are correct 2) Sufficient funds available 3) Card hasn't expired 4) Billing address matches card 5) Try a different payment method or contact your bank.

question: How do I cancel my order?
answer: You can cancel orders within 1 hour of placing them. Go to 'My Orders', find your order, and click 'Cancel'. If it's already processing, you'll need to return it once delivered.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. International shipping takes 7-14 business days. Customs fees may apply and are the customer's responsibility. Free international shipping on orders over $100.

question: How do I update my account information?
answer: To update account info: 1) Log into your account 2) Go to 'Account Settings' 3) Edit profile, addresses, or payment methods 4) Save changes. You can also change your password here.

question: What is your price matching policy?
answer: We price match identical items from major competitors. Submit a price match request with the competitor's URL. We'll verify and adjust the price. Price match valid for 14 days after purchase.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: Contact us via: 1) Live chat (24/7) 2) Email: support@company.com 3) Phone: 1-800-SUPPORT 4) Contact form on website. Average response time is under 2 hours during business hours.

question: What if an item is out of stock?
answer: For out-of-stock items: 1) Click 'Notify Me' to get restocked alerts 2) Check similar products 3) Join waitlist for popular items 4) Contact support for estimated restock dates.

question: How do I apply a discount code?
answer: To apply discount codes: 1) Add items to cart 2) Go to checkout 3) Enter code in 'Promo Code' field 4) Click 'Apply' 5) Discount will reflect in total. Codes have expiration dates and terms.

question: What is your warranty policy?
answer: We offer: 1) 1-year manufacturer warranty on electronics 2) 90-day warranty on clothing 3) Lifetime warranty on select premium items 4) Extended warranty options available at checkout.

question: How do I leave a product review?
answer: To review products: 1) Go to product page 2) Scroll to reviews section 3) Click 'Write Review' 4) Rate and write feedback 5) Submit. You can only review purchased items.
